name: Embed and Integrate Etsy Shop
author: Embed360

sections.description:
We’re thrilled to unveil one of the most comprehensive Etsy Shop embed solutions to date. Our Embed and Integrate Etsy Shop plugin seamlessly displays your Etsy shop listings on your website, offering visitors detailed item information. Getting started is easy – just install the plugin and create an account on Embed360.io. This account equips you with the necessary tools to embed your Etsy shop listings onto your WordPress website using our step-by-step instructions.

We understand that you may be new to Etsy e-commerce, so we provide the flexibility to embed up to 10 listings for free. This enables you to establish your online presence without any initial expenses.

See the demo

Main Shop Listings Page

The Main Shop Listings Block was carefully crafted with your needs in mind. Our priority was to ensure simplicity and style, seamlessly blending with your chosen theme while delivering essential information to empower your visitors in making informed purchasing decisions.

Item Details Page

Just like a genuine e-commerce platform, when your visitors explore item details, they encounter a beautifully arranged product details page. This page includes a comprehensive array of information such as product images, variations, quantity, materials, description, and fulfillment details, ensuring a rich and engaging shopping experience.

Check Out On Etsy

Once your visitor has completed their journey on your website and clicked on the “Checkout” button, they will be seamlessly redirected to Etsy to finalize their order. This streamlined process ensures a smooth transition for completing the purchase, providing your customers with the familiar and trusted environment of Etsy’s checkout system.
sections.installation:
This section describes how to install the plugin and get it working.

  1. Visit Plugins > Add New
  2. Search for Embed and Integrate Etsy Shop
  3. Install Embed and Integrate Etsy Shop once it appears
  4. Activate Embed and Integrate Etsy Shop from your Plugins page.
  5. Once Activated, go to “Etsy Embed” in the left column.
sections.faq:
Who should use this plugin

Anyone with an Etsy shop and a website.

Do you offer a free version

We offer both a free limited version and a paid premium version. The

short_description: The Etsy Embed and integrate plugin allows you to add your Etsy Shop Listing and Item Details on your Wordpress website.
